data.actual_result: you are not online in the list of users in a guild
data.expected_result: User will not be online in the list
data.short_description: The user is not displayed online in the user list after changing the language.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have sync across clients enabled in your language settings- Go into the settings and change the language of the application to any other - change the language of the application to the one that was before - wait
